raw: ½ cup (122g) pure pumpkin puree (make sure it’s super smooth &#8211; some brands are a little thicker with chunks. If this is the case, blend with the water to smooth it out completely)

expected.item: pure pumpkin puree (make sure it’s super smooth - some brands are a little thicker with chunks. If this is the case, blend with the water to smooth it out completely)
